REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0786 reute b f BC-NEW-DUTCH-ADVANCES-TO 03-02 0093

TEXT.TITLE: NEW DUTCH ADVANCES TOTAL 4.8 BILLION GUILDERS
TEXT.BODY: The Dutch Central Bank said it has accepted bids totalling 4.8 billion guilders at tender for new seven-day special advances at 5.3 pct covering the period March 2 to 9 aimed at relieving money market tightness. Subscriptions to 300 mln guilders were met in full, amounts above 300 mln at 50 pct. The new facility replaces old five-day advances worth 8.0 billion guilders at the same rate. Dealers expect this week's money market shortage to be around 12 billion guilders. Reuter
